[ APC] today kicks off a national grassroots signature drive urging conservatives and tea party members to sign a declaration encouraging MMike Pence to run for President," the group said in an early-Monday news release. Throughout his distinguished career, Mike Pence has demonstrated the ability to enthusiastically advance the cause of conservatives and constitutional, limited government, and for that reason I am encouraging him to get in the race, said Jim Ryun . Ralph Benko, a former Reagan administration deputy counsel who helps Jim Ryun run the APC, said that Mike Pence 's ability to unite the three traditional areas of conservatism- fiscal, foreign policy,

that he actually did it under fire- is just a very big deal," Benko added. Benko also said that Mike Pence 's open commitment to socially conservative values would resonate with tea party members: He has demonstrable integrity both in his word and his deed- that is really extraordinary, Benko said. "I think people are looking for integrity, and Mike Pence 's integrity is so vivid that once you focus on it, I think that's going to move a lot of people."

and former Sen. Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.------
